name: auth_rls_initplan
title: Auth RLS Initialization Plan
description: Detects if calls to \`current_setting()\` and \`auth.<function>()\` in RLS policies are being unnecessarily re-evaluated for each row
detail: Table \`public.device_connections\` has a row level security policy \`Users can view their own device connections\` that re-evaluates current_setting() or auth.<function>() for each row. This produces suboptimal query performance at scale. Resolve the issue by replacing \`auth.<function>()\` with \`(select auth.<function>())\`. See [docs](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/database/postgres/row-level-security#call-functions-with-select) for more info.
cache_key: auth_rls_init_plan_public_device_connections_Users can view their own device connections
